SA01n791:4: rūpādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ bahudhābhinnalakṣaṇasaṃjñānāmekayā sāmudāyikyā sattvaprajñaptyā'kṛcchreṇa ehi yāhi ityeva mādi saṃvyavaharaṇāt |
SA01n791:6: na hi loke dharmamātrasaṃjñābhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāro nirūḍhaḥ kiṃtarhi prāyeṇa sattvasaṃjñayā |
SA01n791:9: pratītyasamutpādadharmatāyāma kovidāḥ sahasāditaḥ sarvathā sattvābhāvaṃ śrutvottrasyeyuriti |
SA01n791:11: itarathā hi sattvaprajñaptimantareṇa saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇamātradeśanāyāṃ satyāmamuṣmin saṃtāne'mī doṣāḥ prahīṇā amī vā guṇā utpannā iti na śakyate vijñātumiti ||
SA01n791:16: samabhāga caritaḥprakṛti[stha]ḥ saṃkleśaḥ autkaṭayamāndyavivarjitasamāva sthe kleśa ityarthaḥ,
SA01n791:27: vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratyalabhata ityaṣṭābhyāṃ bhūmāvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhata ityarthaḥ ||
SA01n791:28: asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhārādayo mokṣabhāgīyānāṃ ca mṛdumadhyādhi mātratayā nirvedhabhāgīyotpādanaṃ satyābhisamayaṃ ca pratiniyatāniyata tajjanmakālikatvādyathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ |
SA01n791:38: kuśala dharmacchanda mupādāya yāvanmokṣārtha kriyate tadādhikārikam |
SA01n791:43: tatra yatsatyā lambanakāramādito mṛdukaṃ kuśalamūlamutpadyate tadānulomikam |
SA01n791:46: yadadhimātraṃ satyaprativedhāya tatraiva janmani saṃvartate tatprātivedhikam |
SA01n791:47: tatpunaryadani yatagotrāṇāṃ bodhiviśeṣāya pariṇāmyate tacca pratyekabuddhānāmanācāryakābhisaṃbodhāya janmāntare pariṇamati tadanyapāriṇāmikam |
SA01n791:52: aṣṭau vimokṣā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādayaḥ paścānnirdekṣyante |
SA01n791:55: strotāpattiphalapratipannaka ekāsanikaṃ ni rvedhabhāgīyamārabhya yāvadādyaṃ phalaṃ na prāpnoti ||
SA01n791:57: yaḥ pradeśavairāgyeṇāpi kāmebhyo'vīta rāgaḥ samyaktvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati |
SA01n791:58: yastu pūrva laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarān bhāvanāprahātavyān ṣaṭprakārān prahāya yatra yo vītarāgo bhavan paścātsamyaktvaṃ niyāmama vakrāmati sa ṣoḍaśe cittakṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmyeva bhavati |
SA01n791:59: navāpi prakārān prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavan yo niyāmamavakrāmati so'nāgāmyeva bhavati ||
SA01n791:60: sarvadarśanaprahātavyaprahāṇe'pi trayāṇāmeva saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotāpanna vacanam,
SA01n791:63: uccalito'pi kathaṃcinmokṣaṃ prati śīlavrataparāmarśena vicikitsayā cāsanmārgābhiniveśātsanmārgasaṃśayanācca mithyā niryāti samyaktvamaniryāti ||
SA01n791:70: sakṛdā[gā]miphalapratipannakaḥ darśanamārgādūrdhva kāmāvacarasya yāvanmadhyamadhyasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n791:71: sakṛdāgāmī madhyamṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇa mārga parisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n791:72: anāgāmi phalapratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalādūrdhva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ mṛdvadhimātra mṛdumadhyayoḥ kleśaprakārayoḥ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n791:73: anāgāmī navamasya mṛdumṛdoḥ kleśaprakārasya prahāṇāya mārgaparisamāptau yaḥ pudgalaḥ ||
SA01n791:74: sarvakāmāvacarabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇe'pi pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmivacanaṃ sūtre eṣāṃ gatidhātvavarakāraṇatvena prādhānyāt |
SA01n791:84: kulaṃ kulaḥ kulaḥ stro tāpanna eva sakṛdāgāmiphala pratipannako deveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā niyamena dvau bhavau saṃsṛtya parinirvāti |
SA01n791:85: ekavīcikaḥ sakṛdāgāmyevānāgāmiphalapratipannako deveṣvevaikaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsṛtyaṃ parinirvāti |
SA01n791:87: antarāparinirvāyī yena kleśāvedhenopapattideśaṃ gatvā pratisandadhyāttatparikṣaye sati yenānuśayamātreṇa maraṇādūrdhva skandhānabhinirvartayan tadavaśeṣe satyantarābhavamabhinirvartya pūrvābhyastamārgasaṃmukhībhāvādeva sa viśiṣṭānuśaya prahāṇe parinirvāti |
SA01n791:88: sa punarupapattideśaṃ pratyanuccalito ccalitamātradūragabhāvasthatayā tri vidho veditavyaḥ satpuruṣagatisūtrānusāreṇa |
SA01n791:92: tatra akaniṣṭhaga āsvādanābahulatayotpannotpannamṛdvādidhyānaprakārāsvādanāt brahmakāyikānārabhya nirantaraṃ sarveṣu sthānāntareṣu sakṛtsakṛdupapadyamāno yāvadakaniṣṭhānpraviśya parinirvāti |
SA01n791:93: bhavāgragaścaturthasya dhyānasyāvyavakīrṇabhāvitvāt kevalaṃ śuddhāvāsān parihṛtya tathaiva yāvadbhavāgra gatvā parinirvāti |
SA01n791:94: vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya mṛdvādipañcaprakārabhāvitatvā dyathākramaṃ pañcasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattirveditavyā |
SA01n791:105: sattvaparipācanārtha kāmadhātāvapi bodhisattva upapadyata iti veditavyam ||
SA01n791:108: adhimukticārī bodhisattvagotre vyavasthita ādito mahābodhiprasthānamupādāya yāvatpramuditāṃ bhūmiṃ na praviśati,
SA01n791:120: evaṃ yāvan mṛdumṛdūn darśanaprahātavyān na tu laukikamārgavadbhūmiprakārabhedena pṛthakpṛthagityarthaḥ |
SA01n791:121: tatredaṃ jñāpakaṃ yathoktamaṃgulyagrasūtre - “ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannamiti vistareṇa yāvaddūre yadvā'ntike tatsarvamekadhyamasaṃkṣipyakaṃ bhāgaṃ karotyekaṃ piṇḍamekaṃ puñjamekaṃ rāśiṃ karotyekaṃ kṛtvā'taḥ pratisaṃśikṣate sarvametadanityaṃ sarva duḥkhamiti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:127: sa dṛṣṭe dharme yadyājñāṃ tārāgayati sarvato niḥśeṣamavītarāgatvātpraṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātāvupapadyate kṣipraparinirvāṇārtham ||
SA01n791:129: tatra dharmābhisamayaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu paratoghoṣamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā dhimātrasyādhimuktiprasādasya paścimamokṣabhāgīyasaṃgṛhītasya pratilambhaḥ |
SA01n791:131: arthābhisamayasteṣveva dharmeṣu yoniśomanaskāra madhipatikṛtvā'dhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dharmanidhyānakṣānte [: ]
SA01n791:133: sā punardharmanidhyānakṣāntistrividhena yoniśomanaskāreṇa prabhāvitā adhimātramṛdunā tajjanmakāleṣūṣmagateṣu,
SA01n791:137: tatra punaḥ satyavyavasthāpanānyabhisamayāntikāni saṃvṛtijñānāni pratilambhato lokottarajñānādhipatyena tadabījapoṣaṇānna tu sammukhīkaroti ṣoḍaśānāṃ darśanamārgacittakṣaṇānāṃ nirantaratvena laukikacittānavakāśāt |
SA01n791:141: supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃgha ityevamavetya niścityāryaśrāvakasya buddhādiṣu prasādaḥ |
SA01n791:142: asamudācārābhisamayo yasyākaraṇasaṃvarasyāyaṃkāntaśīla saṃgṛhītasya lābhāttadvipakṣanarakādyasamudācāraṃ pratyevaṃ niścayaḥ pravarttate kṣoṇā me narakāḥ ityevamādiḥ so'samudācārābhisamayaḥ |
SA01n791:143: niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ sarvadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprastrabdhirityevamādiryathā mārgasatye niṣṭhāmārgo nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA01n791:144: eta eva saptābhisamayāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ paratoghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate |
SA01n791:146: bodhisattvābhisamaya eṣu saptasvabhisamayeṣu bodhisattvasya yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavinayo pāyakauśalyārtha no tu sākṣātkriyā sattvāpekṣayā hīnayānāniryāṇāt |
SA01n791:148: etaṃ cābhisamaya niśrityocyate - śrāvakābhisamayādbodhisattvābhisamasya kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ ālaṃbanaviśeṣato vaipulyālaṃvanatvāt |
SA01n791:150: prativedhaviśeṣataḥ pudgaladharmanairātmyādhipateyadharmaprayogavedhato lokottareṇa jñānena tadubhayaprativedhāt abhyupagamaviśeṣataḥ svātmasamatayā sarvasattvā bhyupagamāt |
SA01n791:162: bhogaviśeṣaḥ sadā bodhisattveḥ saha parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu vicitradharmasaṃbhogāt |
SA01n791:163: kamaviśeṣo yathārha nirmāṇeḥ samantā danantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānāditi |
SA01n791:166: miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ suviśuddhadharmadhātvekarasatayā tadāśritāsu sarvākāravarajñatāsu pratyekaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sāmarthyāt |
SA01n791:169: abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanopāyaviśeṣato daśasu dikṣu yathāyogaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu yāvadaparāntaṃ punaḥpunarbuddhotpādādi saṃdarśanena sarvavineyajanaparipācanavimocanāt |
SA01n791:173: apāyaparitrāṇaṃ darśanamārgotpādanena durgatisamatikramaṇāt satkāyaparitrāṇamarhattvasākṣātka raṇena traidhātukavi mokṣāṇāt |
SA01n791:175: vaiśaṃṣikaguṇā āryaśrāvakairbhāvanāmārge vā'bhinirhriyante'śaikṣamārge vetyata eṣāṃ pṛṣṭhaniṣṭhābhisamayābhyāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
SA01n791:176: te punarmaitryādayo yathā sūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ śrāvakayāne mahāyāne ca tathaiva veditavyāḥ |
SA01n791:177: teṣāṃ cāya samāsena pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ lakṣaṇanirdeśo veditavyaḥ - niśrayata ālaṃbanata ākārataḥ svabhāvataḥ sahāyataśca ||
SA01n791:182: cittacaitasikāḥ sahāyā ityevaṃ karuṇādiṣu yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam |
SA01n791:183: upekṣayā sukhādiṣu sattveṣvanunayādyabhyupekṣaṇamaho vata saṃkleśādvimucyerannityayamākāro veditavyaḥ |
SA01n791:186: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ prathamo vimokṣa iti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:188: svātmanyā rūpyasamāpattisaṃniśrayeṇa rūpasaṃjñāyā abhibhāvanādrūpasaṃjñāsaṃniveśanādvā draṣṭavyāni rūpasaṃjñāsaṃmukhī karaṇādityarthaḥ |
SA01n791:197: tathāhi śubhā ni rūpāṇyapekṣya tadanyeṣvaśubhānīti bhavatyaśubhāni vāpekṣya śubhānīti nānapekṣyaikajātīyānāmeva darśane śubhāśubhatābuddhyabhāvāt |
SA01n791:199: śubhasaṃmatasyāpi tvaṅmātrasya keśādiṣaṭtriśadaśucidravyāntara bhāvādityevamanyonyaṃ sarvarūpāṇi miśrayitvā śubha taikarasākā rayā saṃjñayā vimucyate |
SA01n791:200: tasyaivaṃ rūpādivi mokṣavibhu tvalābhinaḥ śubhāśubhanirmāṇāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate tatra ca saṃkleśo tpattyāvaraṇam |
SA01n791:204: ākāśānantyāyatanādīni catvāryāryaśrāvakasya yānyanā śravānukūlāni śuddhāni tāni vimokṣakākhyāṃ labhante,
SA01n791:206: ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārūpyāsteṣva saktiḥ pariśuddhiḥ |
SA01n791:217: ata eva cānayoḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti vacanaṃ nānyeṣu rūpyarūpivimokṣāvaraṇāśeṣaprahāṇādyathākramam |
SA01n791:219: aṣṭāvabhibhvāyatanāni tatra adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni hīnapraṇī tāni,
SA01n791:220: tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathā ca saṃjñī bhavati |
SA01n791:222: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni vistareṇa yāvattayā ca saṃjñī bhavati |
SA01n791:224: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyetasmādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete |
SA01n791:225: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni vistareṇa yāvattathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati |
SA01n791:227: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyadhimātrāṇi yathā tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati |
SA01n791:229: ityete dve abhibhvāyatane adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyeta smādvimokṣādabhinirhriyete |
SA01n791:230: evaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ catvāryabhibhvāyatanāni veditavyāni |
SA01n791:231: adhyātma[ma]rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni |
SA01n791:232: tadyathā umakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇa nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni yāvannī lanirbhāsāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyābhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati |
SA01n791:234: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni yāvatpītanirbhāsāni |
SA01n791:235: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇamiti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:237: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni yāvallohitanirbhāsāni |
SA01n791:238: tadyathā vandhujīvaka puṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohita[varṇa]miti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:240: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatyavadā tānyavadātavarṇā nyavadātanidarśanānyavadātanirbhāsāni |
SA01n791:241: tadyathā uṣasi tārakāyā varṇa saṃpanna vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastramavadātamavadāta varṇamavadātanidarśanamavadātanirbhāsamevamevādhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatya vadātānyavadātavarṇānyavadātanidarśanānyavadātanirbhāsāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavati |
SA01n791:243: etāni catvāri śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyetasmā dvimokṣādabhinirhriyate ||
SA01n791:251: tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūye ti vaśe vartayitvā |
SA01n791:254: tathāsaṃjñī ca bhavatītyabhibhūte nābhi bhūte vā tannirabhimānasaṃjñitāmupādāya |
SA01n791:261: aparaḥ paryāyasta dyathā nīlamiti puṣpavastrayoḥ samānamuddeśapadam |
SA01n791:266: ityevaṃ kṛtvā dṛṣṭānte'pi tadyathomakāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇasīyakaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇamityevamādinirdeśa upapanno bhavati |
SA01n791:270: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītye vamādi |
SA01n791:271: tatpunaryathā rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatītyevamādi nirdeśānusāreṇa draṣṭavyam ||
SA01n791:272: evamabhibhvāyata nairālaṃvanaṃ vaśe vartayitvā kṛtsnāyatanaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ spharati samantānantā paryantaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ |
SA01n791:274: tadyathā pṛthivīkṛtsnamapkṛtsnaṃ tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ vāyukṛtsnaṃ pītakṛtsnaṃ lohitakṛtsnamavadātakṛtsnamākāśānantyāyatanakṛtsnaṃ vijñānānantyāyatana kṛtsnaṃ ca |
SA01n791:275: kṛtsnāyataneṣu pṛthivyādīni yadi na vyavasthāpyeran tenāśrayamahābhūtairvinā tadupādāyarūpaṃ nīlādiakaṃ spharituṃ na śakyeta |
SA01n791:276: tasyāśrayasya rūpasya spharaṇasamṛddhimupādāyaiṣāṃ kṛtsneṣu vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam |
SA01n791:281: araṇā vihārī yeṣāṃ sattvānāmābhāsaṃ gantukāmo bhavati teṣāmātmani kleśa samudācāramadhikṛtyānāgatavṛttāntaṃ vihāragata eva praṇidhijñāna balenāvalokya tathā tatsamīpamupasaṃkrāmati na vā yathā te tatrānunayapratidherṣyāmātsaryā dikaṃ kleśopakleśasaraṇaṃ notpādayanti |
SA01n791:282: ata idamucyate'raṇā dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhāviti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:284: tatra tatra mānasaṃ praṇidhāyedaṃ jānīyāmiti dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
SA01n791:292: dharmanirvacane ceti tadyathā lujyate pralujyate tasmāllokaḥ,
SA01n791:294: pratibhānapratisaṃviddharmaprabhedeṣviti dravyasantaḥ prajñaptisantaḥ saṃvṛtisantaḥ paramārthasanta ityevamādiṣu ||
SA01n791:295: ṛddhayabhijñā vicitraddhivikuvitasamṛddhāviti tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādau |
SA01n791:299: cyutyutpādābhijñā divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyavamānānāmupapadyamānānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ durvarṇānāṃ sugatimapi gacchatāṃ durgati mapyaparāntamārabhya cyutyupapādasaṃdarśanasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ |
SA01n791:302: lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni yatsamādhiprajñādhipatyena buddhā bhagavanto dvātriśatā lakṣaṇairaśītyānuvyañjanaiḥ vibhrājamānaṃ rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayanti vineyā nām |
SA01n791:307: catastraḥ sarvakārāḥ pariśuddhayo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānām |
SA01n791:308: tatra yathākāmamāśrayasyopādāna sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhāviti yatrecchati tatropapattigrahaṇataḥ,
SA01n791:316: daśa balāni - sthānā sthānajñānabalaṃ karmasvakajñānabalaṃ dhyā navimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalamindriyaparāparajñānabalaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ nānādhātujñānabalaṃ sarvatragāminīpratipajjñāna balaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ cyutyupapādajñānabalamāsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ca |
SA01n791:319: catvāri vaiśāradyāni - samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sata ime te dharmā anabhisaṃbuddhā ityatra māṃ kaścicchramaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā sahadharmeṇa codayedvā nimittamapi na samanupaśyāmyetacca nimitta[ma] samanupaśyan kṣemaprāptaśca vaiśāradyaprāptaścodāramārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāmi,
SA01n791:322: kṣoṇāsravasya vata me sata ime āstravā aparikṣīṇā iti |
SA01n791:323: ye vā punarme śrāvakā[ṇā]ma ntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tān pratiṣevamānasya nālamanta rāyāteti yo vā punarme śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ākhyāta āryonairyāṇiko nairvedhikaḥ sa vata na samyaṅniryāti tatkarasya samyagduḥ[kha] kṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai ityatra māṃ kaścit śrama ṇo vā brāhma ṇo vā yāvatsiṃhanādaṃ nadāmoti vistareṇekaṃ kasmin vaktavyam |
SA01n791:324: tānyetāni vaiśāradyāni svārtha parārtha cārabhya veditavyāni |
SA01n791:327: tatrabhisaṃbodhivaiśāradyaṃ jñānātmakaṃ svārthamevārabhya sarvākāraṃ mayā saprabhedaparyantaṃ jñeyamabhisaṃbuddhamityetasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ samyaṅniranuyojyatvena sarvasmin loke pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiriti pūrvavat |
SA01n791:330: sarvākārā antarāyikkā dharmāḥ sarve sāṃkleśikāḥ vipakṣadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA01n791:331: sarvākāro nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ prayogamārgamārabhya yāvanniṣṭhāmārgo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA01n791:333: iha śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharma deśayatyanukampakaḥ kāru ṇiko'rthakāmo hitaiṣī karuṇāya mānaḥ - idaṃ vo bhikṣavo hitāya idaṃ sukhāya idaṃ hitasukhāyeti |
SA01n791:334: tasya te śrāvakāḥ śuśrūṣante śrotramavadadhatyājñācittamupasthāpayanti pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam |
SA01n791:335: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvamupekṣakastatra tathāgato viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan |
SA01n791:338: punaraparaṃ śāstā śrāvakāṇāṃ dharma deśayati yāvadidaṃ hita sukhāya |
SA01n791:339: tasya te śrāvakā na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam |
SA01n791:340: tatra tathāgatasya nāghāto bhavati nākṣāntirnāpratyayo na cetaso'nabhirāddhirupekṣakastatreti vistaraḥ |
SA01n791:342: tṛtīye'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ - asyaike śrāvakāḥ śuśrūpante yāvatpratipadyante dharmasyānudharmameke na śuśrūṣante yāvanna pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam |
SA01n791:343: tatra tathāgatasya na nāndo bhavati yāvaccetaso nā bhirāddhiriti |
SA01n791:344: etā[ni]trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni śāsturgaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākramaṃ sarvākārānunayapratighatadubhayasaṃkleśavāsanāyā asamudācārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ ||
SA01n791:347: nāsti tathā gatasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccinme pare vi[jā]nīyuriti |
SA01n791:349: ebhirnirvaktavyatayā nirāśaṅkatvātsvayaṃ śāstuvineyajanaparikarṣaṇamārabhya yatheṣṭaṃ nigṛhya prasajyāvavādānuśāsanīprayogaḥ samṛddhayatīti veditavyam ||
SA01n791:350: asaṃmoṣadharmatā sarvavineyakāryamārabhya yathāvatkṛtasya bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ ||
SA01n791:351: vāsanāsamudghātaḥ sarvajñasya sataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaśeṣasūcakānāṃ kāyavākceṣṭitānāmasamudācārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ ||
SA01n791:352: mahākaruṇā traidhātukāvacareṣu sarvasattveṣu nirantara sarvaprakāraduḥkhālaṃbana karuṇāvihārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ ||
SA01n791:372: tadyathā arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravaḥ grāmaṃ piṇḍāya carannekadā caṇḍena hastinā sārgha samāgacchati |
SA01n791:379: araṇye vā punamārga hitvā kumārgeṇa gacchati |
SA01n791:380: corairvā taskarairvā sārdha samāgacchati siṃhairvyāghrairvāpa ravṛkairvā ityevaṃ bhāgīyaṃ skhalitamarhatastathāgatasya sarveṇa sarva nāsti |
SA01n791:381: punarayamarhanne kadā'raṇye pravaṇe'nvāhiṇḍanmārgādapanaśya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya śabdamudīrayati,
SA01n791:384: vāsanā doṣaṃ vā''gamya kliṣṭaṃ mahāhāsaṃ hasati,
SA01n791:386: ityevaṃbhāgīyamarhato ravitaṃ tathāgatasya sarveṇa sarva nāsti |
SA01n791:390: punaraparamarhannekāntenopadhā ca pratikramaṇasaṃjñī bhavati nirupadhike ca nirvāṇe śāntasaṃjñī |
SA01n791:391: tathāgatasya upadhau nirvāṇe ca nānātvasaṃjñā nāsti,
SA01n791:395: punaraparamarhan jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhyāprāptaparihāṇyā chandenā pi parihīyate vīrye ṇāpismṛtyā samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanenā pi parihīyate |
SA01n791:400: tathāgatasya trayāṇāmapi karmaṇāṃ jñāna pūrvagamatvājjñānānuparivartitvācca nāstyavyākṛtaṃ karma tatra jñānasamutthāpanatāmupādāya jñānapūrvagamam |
SA01n791:402: punaraparamarhan traiyadhvikaṃ jñeyavastu na cābhogamātrātpratipadyate yenāsya saktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati |
SA01n791:403: na ca sarva pratipadyate yenāsya pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati |
SA01n791:409: tatra nāsti muṣitasmṛtiḥ nāstyasamānitaṃ cittaṃ nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā nāstyapratisaṃkhyāyopekṣetyetaccatuṣṭayaṃ manaskarmapariśuddhimadhikṛtya veditavyam |
SA01n791:410: nāsti chandaparihāṇiryāvannāsti vimuktijñānadarśanaparihāṇiriti sāśrayāṇāṃ saphalānāṃ tathāgatendriyāṇāmaprāptyaparihāṇisamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ |
SA01n791:414: sarva kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma jñānapūrvagamaṃ jñānānuvartītyete trayo'sādhāraṇakarmacārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ |
SA01n791:418: abhinirhāropāyaḥ punaryathāvyavasthānaṃ manaskārabahulīkāratā yathādeśanaṃ samāhitasya cittasya punaḥpunastatra dhāraṇamityarthaḥ |
SA01n791:419: tadyathā'pramāṇānyabhinirhartukāmo maṃtrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsapatnenetyevamādikāṃ deśanāṃ dhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa bhāvayan manasikurvan bahulīkaroti,
SA01n791:420: evamabhijñādīnabhi nirhartukāma eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatītyevamādikaṃ vyavasthānaṃ manasikurvan bahulīkarotīti yojayitavyam ||
SA01n791:422: svakāritrapratyupasthānāśca yairāryo yathāyogaṃ vipakṣaprahāṇādikaṃ karma karoti,
SA01n791:424: tatrāpramāṇaivipakṣaṃ prajahātīti yathākramaṃ vyāpādaṃ vihiṃsāmaratimanunayapratighau ca |
SA01n791:428: ata eva sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidya te ,
SA01n791:432: catubhirārya vimokṣaiḥ śānteṣu mokṣeṣu na sajjate |
SA01n791:444: āśrayapariśuddhayā yathākāmamāśrayasyopādānasthāna parityāgānadhikṛtya saṃcintya bhavopapattiparigrahaṇādīni trīṇi veditavyāni |
SA01n791:448: baleṣu dvābhyāṃ balābhyāmabhyudayamārga deśayati śeṣairniḥśreyasamārgame tāvacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ karaṇīyam |
SA01n791:449: tatra sthānāsthānajñānabalena bhagavannirhe tuko'bhyudayaḥ prakṛtīśvarādihetuko vetye vamahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratikṣipati |
SA01n791:456: sarvatragāminīpratipajjñānabalenālaṃbanaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānaṃ vā deśanādharma saṃgṛhītadharma manupraviśati |
SA01n791:459: āsravakṣayajñānabalena niḥsaraṇaṃ ca sarvasmāttraidhātukāda nupraviśati yato yathāvanmokṣamārga deśayati ||
SA01n791:462: sthānāsthāne yāvadāsravakṣaya iti sarvatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭasya praśnavyākaraṇavyāghātācca ||
SA01n791:471: vāsanāsa mudghātena niḥkleśaḥ kleśapratirūpāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na darśayati yathā'rhan bhikṣuḥ skhalitādikaṃ darśayati ||
SA01n791:473: ko hīyate kaḥ parihīyata ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ pratyavekṣaṇāt ||
SA01n791:478: tatra tatra vineyasaṃśayacchedanārtha deśitānāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ saṃgītikārairanukrameṇa saṃjñāpanāt |
SA01n791:479: dharmanetrīṃ nistrityā paripakvāḥ sattvāḥ paripacyante paripakvāśca vimucyante ||
SA01n791:480: viśiṣṭamārga lābhe hīnamārgavihānistadyathā phalasaṃgṛhītamārgalābhe pratipannakamārgo vihīna ityucyate,
SA01n791:482: sakalaprahāṇaṃ ca sā kṣātkaroti phalaprāptikāle tu tadvipakṣajātīyakleśapratipakṣa dauṣṭhulyāśeṣaprahāṇādāśrayaparivṛttiviśeṣalābhataḥ samavasargavihānyā vijahātī[tya] tyantāsamudācāraṃ vijahā[tī]tyarthaḥ |
SA01n791:485: ata eva bodhisattvā akṣayakuśalamūlā akṣayaguṇā ityucyante tadyathā'kṣamiti[sūtre]'kṣayatānirdiṣṭeti ||
SA01n791:487: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ praśnānāṃ kīdṛśaḥ punaḥ praśno 'rthopasaṃhitaḥ |
SA01n791:494: bhrāntyāśrayo yasminnāryajñā nagocare saṃskāranimittamātre'bhūtaparikalpātmake sati bālānāṃ so'bhiniveśaḥ pravartate |
SA01n791:505: dānapāramitāṃ yāvat sarvākāravarajñatāṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāsyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamiti vacanāt |
SA01n791:506: kṣiprābhijñatākauśalyaṃ ṣaṭkṛtvā rātridivasaṃ pāpapratideśanā puṇyānumodanā buddhādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlapariṇāmanā ca yathākra[ma]māryamaitreyaparipṛcchāyām |
SA01n791:507: dharmānupacchedakauśalyaṃ cāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇatayā punaḥpanaranupa ratamatyantaṃ ca samantāllokadhātuṣu yathāvineyaṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāsaṃdarśanāditi ||
SA01n791:522: vi kṣepavikalpaḥ yoniśo vikalpādabhāvādigrāhalakṣaṇo yo vikalpaḥ ||
SA01n791:524: sa eṣa daśavidho vikalpaḥ prajñāpāramitā''dinirdeśamadhikṛtya veditavyaḥ |
SA01n791:525: yathoktam iha śāriputra bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva san bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati |
SA01n791:531: tathāhi nāma svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā,
SA01n791:532: rūpaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā yāvadvijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ na śūnyatayā |
SA01n791:541: nāmamātramidaṃ yaduta bodhisattvanāmeti bodhisattva iti prajñāpāramiteti bodhiriti rūpamiti yāvadvijñānamiti |
SA01n791:542: svabhāvasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam |
SA01n791:543: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattva utpādamapi na samanupaśyati yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati |
SA01n791:545: kṛtrimaṃ nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnā'nuvyavahriyante |
SA01n791:549: tatra abhāvavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - bodhisattvo bodhisattva eva sannityevamādi,
SA01n791:551: bhāvavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - bodhisattvaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvadvayavadānamapi na samanupaśyati yāvanna caratīti na samanupaśyati pudgaladharmabhāvapratiṣedhāt |
SA01n791:555: tasminnāmni tena parikalpitena parikalpita svabhāvena virahitatāyāḥ sarvadāstitvāt |
SA01n791:556: ekatvavikalpaprati pakṣaiṇāha - yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti ,
SA01n791:558: rūpādayo hi parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyatā pariniṣpanna iti |
SA01n791:566: yathānāmārthavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - kṛtrimaṃ nāma prati prati te dharmāḥ kalpitā āgantukena nāmnā vyavahriyante ityevamādi |
SA01n791:567: yathārthanāmavikalpapratipakṣeṇāha - tāni bodhisattvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanu paśyannābhiniviśata iti ,
SA01n791:570: tatra pṛthagjanā yadi [a] nityatādikāṃ kāṃcidevadharmatāmārabhya cittaparyavasānaṃ nītvā labdhaparitoṣā bhavantyeva metaditi niścinvantaḥ sā teṣāṃ saṃtuṣṭinirvikalpatetyucyate,
SA01n791:572: śrāvakāḥ skandheṣu nityā diviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathāvadrūpādikaṃ dharmadhātuṃ parīkṣamāṇā lokottareṇa jñānena nairātmyaṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāmaviparyāsanirvikalpatetyucyate |
SA01n791:573: bodhisattvāstadapi rūpādidharmamātraṃ prapañca iti viditvā sarvadharmanimittāni vibhāvayantaḥ paramaśāntena lokottareṇa jñānena sarvatragāṃ tathatāṃ pratividhyantyataḥ sā teṣāṃ niṣprapañcanirvikalpatetyucyate |
SA01n791:577: atha samatikramatastena dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti sarvatra nirvikalpatā prāpnoti,
SA01n791:579: tataśca vikalpasya śarīraṃ hi cittacaittāḥ traidhātukā ityasya virodhaḥ |
SA01n791:590: yadā hyasya bodhisattvasyānulomikamavavādamāgamya prakṛtyā sarvadharmanimittānyapariniṣpannānīti vicārayatastadvicāraṇābhyāsabalādhānāt pratyātmamanabhisaṃskāreṇaiva yathāvanniṣprapañcadhātau sarvadharmata thatāyāṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate sā'sāvucyate niṣprapañca nirvikalpateti ||
SA01n791:591: prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyo bodhisattva ityuktaṃ prākkathaṃ tena kālena kālamindriyāṇyutāpayitavyānītyucyate |
SA01n791:593: anyathā tīkṣṇendriyagotrāṇāmindriyāṇāmaikavidhye sati bodhisattvānāmindriyakṛto viśeṣo naivopalabhyate |
